import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import ProductCard from '../Component/ProductCard' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Star from '../Assets/Image/Star.png' const ProductView = () => { const data = useSelector(state => state.SearchBarReducer.SearchBarData) console.log(data) const { name, slug ,} = useParams() console.log(id) return (<> {data.map((item, index) => { return (
{item.Title}
{item.delievery_charge === null ? 'free shipping' : ''}
{item.brandData.name}

{item.Price.sell_price.$numberDecimal} ({item.Price.current_store_price.$numberDecimal})
9% OFF

) })} ) } export default ProductView
